With rising tuition costs, this is a simple way to defray some of the expense.” – Jan H. 3 steps to easy earnings Shop or dine as usual Purchase gift cards at face value (you get the full amount), shop online with your favorite brands, enjoy a meal at a local restaurant, or book travel. Earn money Your organization earns up to 20% per purchase (6% average, 5% for local dining). The earnings come directly from the brand—it's their way of supporting community groups like yours. Distribute earnings Earnings are deposited into your organization’s account. Track and allocate earnings per participant, or channel funds to initiatives that your group cares about. “I have two daughters that dance competitively and travel to national competitions. Within the first six months of using RaiseRight, I’ve earned over $1,000 to cover some of our costs. This is huge—I feel more comfortable letting them chase their dreams, and this wonderful program has allowed our families to help our children shoot for the stars! It has made a difference in our lives.” – Jennifer M.
